attributes.action: Ban peanuts on airplanes and ferries
attributes.background: After recently travelling on a ferry I witnessed people at the bar eating peanuts & wiped their hands on the seats in the lounge area it's just wrong someone could die this is a serious problem & needs to be stopped we don't need nuts on ferries or planes.

rejection.details:
In any case, we can't accept your petition because the Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. At the moment, this is a decision for airlines. The UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to force airlines to take this action. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to work with the EU to urge airlines to remove nuts and nut-based products from planes, if that's what you want to happen.

You'll need to give your full name in order to start a new petition.
